item.title: Utawarerumono: Shiro e no Michishirube latest information broadcast set for November 22
item.content:encoded:
Utawarerumono: Lost Flag sixth anniversary broadcast to follow.

AQUAPLUS will host the “Utawarerumono: Shiro e no Michishirube Official Broadcast: Latest Information Special” on November 22 at 15:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The broadcast will feature the latest information on Utawarerumono: Shiro e no Michishirube, which is due out for unannounced platforms in 2026 in Japan. Presenters include Kentaro Tone (Oshtor voice actor), Yuuko Minaguchi (Shunya voice actor), and Yuuya Uchida (Mikazuchi voice actor).

After that broadcast ends, AQUAPLUS will host the “Utawarerumono: Lost Flag Official Broadcast: 6th Anniversary Special” on November 22 at 17:00 JST, featuring the latest information on the mobile game with presenters Kentaro Tone (Haku / Oshtor voice actor), Yuuya Uchida (Mikazuchi voice actor), Kazuya Nakai (Akuta voice actor), and Ryouka Yuzuki (Eruru voice actor). You will be able to watch it on YouTube.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/utawarerumono-shiro-e-no-michishirube-latest-information-broadcast-set-for-november-22
